name: Enter, Inc.
description: Operator of a revenue cycle management platform intended to get doctors paid from insurance while delighting their patients. The company's platform offers a fast, accurate and transparent revenue cycle management in healthcare, giving complete, real-time transparency into patients' billing operations, enabling users to get increased payer reimbursements, reducing HIPAA risk and getting industry-standard transparency.
